proposal: Navigating the world of domain connections and website setups can feel like trying to win a lottery without a ticket. But with 228 holders on the ETH network, it seems you've already got a winning community! If you're looking to further empower them, consider our suite of B2B tools designed to mesh seamlessly with visions like yours. From launching your own DEX to creating a community-driven lottery, we're here to help you build. Let's make the internet not just a place to connect domains, but communities too.
